title: New-style chicken salad
ingredients: ['4 chicken fillets (skinned and boned breasts), about 675g (1 1/2lb) in total', '2 red, yellow or green peppers, sliced', '1 large red onion, thickly sliced', '2 courgettes, thickly sliced', '175g (6oz) cherry tomatoes, halved', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 teaspoon finely grated lemon zest', '2 teaspoons dried basil', 'good pinch of freshly ground black pepper', '4 handfuls of mixed salad leaves']
